response.original_title: How to stop TotalAV auto renewal? ✦ SUPPORT: ⟬1-855-535-4580⟭ ✦
response.overview: ═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═ If you want to disable TotalAV auto-renewal and prevent future subscription charges, the fastest way to get immediate assistance is by contacting customer support at ═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═ for real-time help. You can also stop TotalAV auto renewal by logging into your account dashboard, going to the Billing Settings or My Subscriptions section, and turning off the automatic renewal option, and if you need step-by-step guidance you can call ═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═ for detailed instructions ═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═.  After disabling auto renewal, make sure you receive a confirmation email verifying that recurring billing has been canceled ═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═, and if you do not receive confirmation you should immediately verify your request by dialing ═✦⟬1-855-535-4580⟭✦═ to avoid unexpected charges.
